price: "Wannan abu bai zamõ ba fãce hãlãyen* mutãnen farko."
footnotes: * Wãtau lãbarun mutãne waɗanda ba su ci gaba ba bã su son a yi rawa da nishãɗi. Anã karantawar ma'anar ƙaryar ta farko, watau wai tãtsũniya ce: a ce wai a hana ãyã akan tsaunuka dõmin wasanni. Suna nufi da ãya ko alãma gidãjen rawa da na nashãdi watau stadiyam da kasĩno.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
